title: Highest grossing Hollywood actors of all time in the U.S. 2019
yAxis: Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Samuel L. Jackson and lowest at Month Mark Ruffalo.
There is a difference of 3343.1 between the maximum Month Samuel L. Jackson and minimum Month Mark Ruffalo.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Samuel L. Jackson and lowest at Month Mark Ruffalo.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Samuel L. Jackson and lowest at Month Mark Ruffalo.
There is a difference of 3343.1 between the maximum Month Samuel L. Jackson and minimum Month Mark Ruffalo.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Month Samuel L. Jackson has the highest Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars and Mark Ruffalo has the lowest Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is found at Month Robert Downey Jr..
The highest Month Samuel L. Jackson has 3343.1 more Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Mark Ruffalo.
Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars at Month Samuel L. Jackson is 7107.8 , second place is Robert Downey Jr. at 5818.8, and thirdly is Scarlett Johannsson at 5244.1.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars has declined over the past 20 Months.
The Month Mark Ruffalo has 1.58 times less Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars than average.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is 90016.5 if we add up values of all Months.
